description.english: Destroy minimum the 3 jewels in one selection
My first time with MUMBA... Complete the first level.
Find the legendary golden goblet of Mumba.
Find a golden skull. Only 5% of people in the world are able to find it.
Complete the game and defeat Mumba.
Defeat the legendary Mumba and take his jewels.
Destroy 50 stones in on game session
Visit all secret places and escape with jewels....
Destroy minimum the 20 jewels in one selection
